data.title: Currency ARS Argentina [Argentine peso]
data.text:
Other currency selection:

Currency

Currency details ARS Argentina [Argentine peso]

Label of currency ARS is Argentine peso.

Currency code ARS is associated to Argentina, flag is used on this site for it.

Amounts in this currency have up to 2 decimals.

It is mainly associated to country or zone Argentina.

Currency code ARS is a 3 letter normalized code according to standard ISO-4217, the 2 first letters are the code of the issuing country, third letter is the initial of the currency.

We recorded price on this currency since 1981-01-01

Current annual inflation rate for currency ARS is 270.979 %.

List of countries that are using or were using currency ARS :
